thread.title: SATTE Mumbai West gears up for 2015 edition
thread.title_full: SATTE Mumbai West gears up for 2015 edition

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: SATTE Mumbai West gears up for 2015 edition
text:
SATTE Mumbai West gears up for 2015 edition Adv: 
Jul 13, 2015 Adv: 
SATTE Mumbai West, the Western chapter of South Asia’s leading travel show SATTE New Delhi, is slated to be held on 18 and 19 August 2015 at the World Trade Centre. The show is aimed at enabling successful business relations between key stakeholders in the travel and tourism space from across the globe. The show promises to bring together exhibitors from around the world to network and build business with the western travel trade fraternity to further tourism to and from India. 
The show has welcomed new additions to its exhibitor portfolio for the 2015 edition. Exhibitors such as Turkey, Fiji, Israel, Rajasthan, Maharashtra, J&K, West Bengal, Abacus and Oyo Rooms amongst others have either confirmed or in the process of confirming their participation for SATTE Mumbai 2015. Oyo Rooms has also come on board as one of the main sponsors, extending their complete support to SATTE Mumbai West. 
UBM India, organizers of SATTE New Delhi and SATTE Mumbai West, have also designed and launched a new website for the western edition. The website i will provide event and exhibitor details to the visitors. 
Last but not least, the SATTE Mumbai West Conference boasts a strong line-up of topics to be discussed and debated by the industry’s experts. The Conference will focus on the current and important issues the travel and hospitality industry faces today.
